user_query: Find the nutritional information for healthy snacks and beverages, calculate the body mass index (BMI) for each team member, and suggest some team-building exercises.

TaskList.description: Research and gather nutritional information for various healthy snacks and beverages.
Calculate the body mass index (BMI) for each team member based on their height and weight.
Suggest a list of team-building exercises that promote fitness and healthy lifestyles.
